Dialogue: So you'll take them?

Original: Dark Manikin (Cater):Just so you know...you can't even begin to imagine what's in these memories.
Dialogue: Just so you know...you can't even begin to imagine what's in these memories.

Original: Dark Manikin (Cinque):We could take it because we're puppets, but...they'll make you cry.
Dialogue: We could take it because we're puppets, but...they'll make you cry.

Original: Cinque:Even if I do, it's fine by me.
Dialogue: Even if I do, it's fine by me.

Original: Cater:It'd hurt me more not remembering like the rest of Class Zero.
Dialogue: It'd hurt me more not remembering like the rest of Class Zero.

Original: Dark Manikin (Deuce):I see...
Dialogue: I see...

Original: Dark Manikin (Deuce):Then let's do this.
Dialogue: Then let's do this.

Original: Dark Manikin (Cinque):It's like Seven and the others said: the rest is up to you guys.
Dialogue: It's like Seven and the others said the rest is up to you guys.

Original: Dark Manikin (Cater):Get your memories back and think carefully. It's fine if you want to ally with Ace after that.
Dialogue: Get your memories back and think carefully. It's fine if you want to ally with Ace after that.

Original: Deuce:I'll keep that in mind.
Dialogue: I'll keep that in mind.

Original: Cater:Alright! Bring it on!
Dialogue: Alright! Bring it on!

Original: Dark Manikin (Deuce):I wasn't sure if I should return your memories or not. You looked like you were having so much fun.
Dialogue: I wasn't sure if I should return your memories or not. You looked like you were having so much fun.

Original: Deuce:But we'll have to face it someday.
Dialogue: But we'll have to face it someday.

Original: Cater:Right. I am a little worried, though...
Dialogue: Right. I am a little worried, though...

Original: Cinque:I don't know if I can face it like a grown-up...
Dialogue: I don't know if I can face it like a grown-up...

Original: Dark Manikin (Deuce):If you can't, rely on your friends. They're beside you for a reason.
Dialogue: If you can't, rely on your friends. They're beside you for a reason.

Original: Deuce:So that's how it ended...
Dialogue: So that's how it ended...

Original: Cinque:We ran ahead...
Dialogue: We ran ahead...

Original: Cater:With all our might... Yeah, that's alright...
Dialogue: With all our might... Yeah, that's alright...

Original: Rem:They're holding back, aren't they...? Isn't there anything I can do?
Dialogue: They're holding back, aren't they...? Isn't there anything I can do?

Original: Selphie:There is. Give them time.
Dialogue: There is. Give them time.

Original: Selphie:Well, think of it this way...
Dialogue: Well, think of it this way...

Original: Selphie:If they died, there would be nothing you could do. But here, they're alive.
Dialogue: If they died, there would be nothing you could do. But here, they're alive.

Original: Selphie:So...believe in them.
Dialogue: So...believe in them.

Original: Selphie:And get ready so that they have nothing to worry about when they get back. How does that sound?
Dialogue: And get ready so that they have nothing to worry about when they get back. How does that sound?

Original: Selphie:Hehe. I guess I got carried away!
Dialogue: Hehe. I guess I got carried away!

Original: Selphie:Anyway, it's your turn to talk now!
Dialogue: Anyway, it's your turn to talk now!

Original: Rem:Right. Thank you.
Dialogue: Right. Thank you.

Original: Freya:Now that you have your memories back...would you like to rest a little?
Dialogue: Now that you have your memories back...would you like to rest a little?

Original: Freya:Rem told me what happened. You don't need to talk about it if you don't want to.
Dialogue: Rem told me what happened. You don't need to talk about it if you don't want to.

Original: Cater:It's okay. We were the ones who didn't know anything.
Dialogue: It's okay. We were the ones who didn't know anything.

Original: Cinque:I'm...sorry about before.
Dialogue: I'm...sorry about before.

Original: Cinque:It really is scary... I don't want to die...
Dialogue: It really is scary... I don't want to die...

Original: Cinque:I don't want to be forgotten...
Dialogue: I don't want to be forgotten...

Original: Freya:I will make sure no one comes. Let your tears wash your soul.
Dialogue: I will make sure no one comes. Let your tears wash your soul.

Original: Yuffie:Whoa! Cinque? And Cater! What happened!?
Dialogue: Whoa! Cinque? And Cater! What happened!?

Original: Freya:Not now, Yuffie
Dialogue: Not now, Yuffie—

Original: Yuffie:So Machina's story really wasn't a dream!?
Dialogue: So Machina's story really wasn't a dream!?

Original: Cinque:Yuffie... Well, we... Sniffle...
Dialogue: Yuffie... Well, we... Sniffle...

Original: Yuffie:Oh no... No way that's fair...
Dialogue: Oh no... No way that's fair...

Original: Cater:N-not you too, Yuffie...
Dialogue: N-not you too, Yuffie...

Original: Yuffie:But...there's nothing I can do...!
Dialogue: But...there's nothing I can do...!

Original: Cater:Still! Crying... Sniffle... Not me, too!
Dialogue: Still! Crying... Sniffle... Not me, too!

Original: Yuffie:Everything...disappears in war.
Dialogue: Everything...disappears in war.

Original: Yuffie:Everyone...knows that...
Dialogue: Everyone...knows that...

Original: Freya:Hm? Are you alright?
Dialogue: Hm? Are you alright?

Original: Deuce:Hehe. For some reason, I'm happier than I am sad.
Dialogue: Hehe. For some reason, I'm happier than I am sad.

Original: Deuce:It's great to have friends who will cry with us.
Dialogue: It's great to have friends who will cry with us.

Original: Deuce:Back home, everyone kept their distance from Class Zero...
Dialogue: Back home, everyone kept their distance from Class Zero...

Original: Deuce:Ah, but of course we had some friends among them. I hope they're doing okay...
Dialogue: Ah, but of course we had some friends among them. I hope they're doing okay...

Original: Selphie:Look! It was worth waiting. If you want to talk, now's your chance!
Dialogue: Look! It was worth waiting. If you want to talk, now's your chance!

Original: Rem:You're talking about the other students, right? In that case...
Dialogue: You're talking about the other students, right? In that case...

Original: Deuce:Yes... Huh... Hehe... What! Really... I see...
Dialogue: Yes... Huh... Hehe... What! Really... I see...

Original: Leo:Children without a place to call home... I wish I could help, but...
Dialogue: Children without a place to call home... I wish I could help, but...

Original: Leo:I am much older than everyone. Perhaps that makes it difficult for them to get close...
Dialogue: I am much older than everyone. Perhaps that makes it difficult for them to get close...

Original: Cater:If our army was led by someone as accomplished as you, we might have changed, too...
Dialogue: If our army was led by someone as accomplished as you, we might have changed, too...

Original: Leo:Cater!? Are you...alright?
Dialogue: Cater!? Are you...alright?

Original: Cater:Cinque and Yuffie are still crying their eyes out, but I'm done with that.
Dialogue: Cinque and Yuffie are still crying their eyes out, but I'm done with that.

Original: Cater:You don't have a place to go home to either, do you? And still you fight...
Dialogue: You don't have a place to go home to either, do you? And still you fight...

Original: Leo:My situation is far different from yours. I don't know if you could compare the two.
Dialogue: My situation is far different from yours. I don't know if you could compare the two.

Original: Cater:It doesn't suit me to look back. Right now, I'm still alive.
Dialogue: It doesn't suit me to look back. Right now, I'm still alive.

Original: Cater:Mother is gone. So maybe I'll give listening to army folks like you a try.
Dialogue: Mother is gone. So maybe I'll give listening to army folks like you a try.

Original: Leo:If it's stories you want to hear...I'll gladly tell you all I can...
Dialogue: If it's stories you want to hear...I'll gladly tell you all I can...

Original: Vincent:...How are you feeling?
Dialogue: ...How are you feeling?

Original: Cinque:Ohh, the strong and silent Vinny! Did you come looking for us?
Dialogue: Ohh, the strong and silent Vinny! Did you come looking for us?

Original: Yuffie:Haha! Strong and silent is right!
Dialogue: Haha! Strong and silent is right!

Original: Vincent:Your eyes are red, Yuffie... I just came to see how you were doing.
Dialogue: Your eyes are red, Yuffie... I just came to see how you were doing.

Original: Cinque:Hehe. I guess they noticed all our wailing...
Dialogue: Hehe. I guess they noticed all our wailing...

Original: Cinque:Right now, I can choose.
Dialogue: Right now, I can choose.

Original: Cinque:I can do things here that I couldn't choose to do in Orience.
Dialogue: I can do things here that I couldn't choose to do in Orience.

Original: Yuffie:Do you want to take a break here, like Ace?
Dialogue: Do you want to take a break here, like Ace?

Original: Cinque:Mm... I don't think so.
Dialogue: Mm... I don't think so.

Original: Cinque:It seems like Machy is still hiding some things. And I want to talk to the others, too.
Dialogue: It seems like Machy is still hiding some things. And I want to talk to the others, too.

Original: Machina:I'm so sorry, everyone...!
Dialogue: I'm so sorry, everyone...!

Original: Machina:I held an unjustified grudge against you and couldn't do anything even at the end...
Dialogue: I held an unjustified grudge against you and couldn't do anything even at the end...

Original: Machina:It might be selfish of me to ask now, but please... I hope you can forgive me!
Dialogue: It might be selfish of me to ask now, but please... I hope you can forgive me!

Original: Eight:Aren't you and Rem the ones who helped us at the end?
Dialogue: Aren't you and Rem the ones who helped us at the end?

Original: Machina:But...I don't think you needed it...
Dialogue: But...I don't think you needed it...

Original: Deuce:We chose to fight. And we fought together, didn't we?
Dialogue: We chose to fight. And we fought together, didn't we?

Original: Machina:I fought you guys because I was weak...
Dialogue: I fought you guys because I was weak...

Original: Machina:But I wanted to fight beside you, so we could protect each other...
Dialogue: But I wanted to fight beside you, so we could protect each other...

Original: Machina:I wanted to be able to laugh and have fun together, as friends...
Dialogue: I wanted to be able to laugh and have fun together, as friends...

Original: Machina:But I didn't have the strength. I was weak...
Dialogue: But I didn't have the strength. I was weak...

Original: Cinque:You don't saaay... Hehehehe...
Dialogue: You don't saaay... Hehehehe...

Original: Machina:Wh-what are you laughing at!?
Dialogue: Wh-what are you laughing at!?

Original: Cinque:It feels like we went around in a circle, and you're back to the Machy we first met!
Dialogue: It feels like we went around in a circle, and you're back to the Machy we first met!

Original: Seven:...I see it now. Earnest and stupidly honest.
Dialogue: ...I see it now. Earnest and stupidly honest.

Original: Cater:Only now he thinks of us as friends. Before it was like Rem was his only ally.
Dialogue: Only now he thinks of us as friends. Before it was like Rem was his only ally.

Original: Machina:...It's stupid, isn't it? I abandoned you all... To try and act like a friend now...
Dialogue: ...It's stupid, isn't it? I abandoned you all... To try and act like a friend now...

Original: King:I don't know if it's stupid or not, but you remembered us.
Dialogue: I don't know if it's stupid or not, but you remembered us.

Original: King:Remembered and sympathized... Isn't someone who does that considered a friend?
Dialogue: Remembered and sympathized... Isn't someone who does that considered a friend?

Original: Machina:...I don't know if I deserve to be called that.
Dialogue: ...I don't know if I deserve to be called that.

Original: Eight:Choosing the wrong path out of kindness... It's not much different from Ace right now.
Dialogue: Choosing the wrong path out of kindness... It's not much different from Ace right now.

Original: Machina:Not much different from...Ace?
Dialogue: Not much different from...Ace?

Original: Seven:Ace has the kindest heart among us...
Dialogue: Ace has the kindest heart among us...

Original: Jack:He built Akademeia, after all, out of sympathy for us.
Dialogue: He built Akademeia, after all, out of sympathy for us.

Original: Cater:I think Machina's words might hit home with Ace right now.
Dialogue: I think Machina's words might hit home with Ace right now.

Original: King:The Cloud of Darkness used Mother's name to try and confuse us.
Dialogue: The Cloud of Darkness used Mother's name to try and confuse us.

Original: King:But I don't think Mother is really here.
Dialogue: But I don't think Mother is really here.

Original: Cater:And both Materia and Spiritus are telling us about people who might be our allies.
Dialogue: And both Materia and Spiritus are telling us about people who might be our allies.

Original: Machina:But I don't remember hearing anything about a doctor from Spiritus...
Dialogue: But I don't remember hearing anything about a doctor from Spiritus...

Original: Cater:Huh!? Does that mean you're one of Spiritus's warriors!?
Dialogue: Huh!? Does that mean you're one of Spiritus's warriors!?

Original: Machina:Th-that's the part you pick up on!?
Dialogue: Th-that's the part you pick up on!?

Original: Cinque:This is news to Cinquey!
Dialogue: This is news to Cinquey!

Original: King:...So we had a lot to talk about, but at least we're all on the same page here.
Dialogue: ...So we had a lot to talk about, but at least we're all on the same page here.

Original: King:First, we'll get Ace back.
Dialogue: First, we'll get Ace back.

Original: Seven:This Akademeia is a home for monsters, not cadets like us...
Dialogue: This Akademeia is a home for monsters, not cadets like us...

Original: Onion Knight:The Cloud of Darkness gave Ace the power to make it so he could cause the flood of darkness...
Dialogue: The Cloud of Darkness gave Ace the power to make it so he could cause the flood of darkness...

Original: King:Ace can be reckless sometimes. He might not be able to turn back now.
Dialogue: Ace can be reckless sometimes. He might not be able to turn back now.

Original: Warrior of Light:Have you chosen to fight with us?
Dialogue: Have you chosen to fight with us?

Original: Seven:...We've only fought a battle on our own orders once.
Dialogue: ...We've only fought a battle on our own orders once.

Original: Seven:We'll search for a reason to fight after this...with Ace.
Dialogue: We'll search for a reason to fight after this...with Ace.

Original: Onion Knight:I got it. Let's go and get our friend back, then!
Dialogue: I got it. Let's go and get our friend back, then!

Original: Onion Knight:And stop the flood of darkness!
Dialogue: And stop the flood of darkness!

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):It's not safe here anymore. Get on this chocobo and get out of here.
Dialogue: It's not safe here anymore. Get on this chocobo and get out of here.

Original: Ace:Everyone got their memories back... So why don't they understand?
Dialogue: Everyone got their memories back... So why don't they understand?

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):As long as you stay alive, there'll be another chance. What's important now is to protect yourself.
Dialogue: As long as you stay alive, there'll be another chance. What's important now is to protect yourself.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):This darkness will eat away at humans and continue growing with no end...
Dialogue: This darkness will eat away at humans and continue growing with no end...

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):So get going!
Dialogue: So get going!

Original: Tidus:What is this place...?
Dialogue: What is this place...?

Original: Zidane:The darkness is swirling... Is Ace really here?
Dialogue: The darkness is swirling... Is Ace really here?

Original: Machina:We went around the whole Akademeia... He has to be.
Dialogue: We went around the whole Akademeia... He has to be.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):You're so weak, and still poking your nose where it doesn't belong, I see.
Dialogue: You're so weak, and still poking your nose where it doesn't belong, I see.

Original: Bartz:Is that Machina's...huh?
Dialogue: Is that Machina's...huh?

Original: Bartz:So even Spiritus's warriors have dark manikins?
Dialogue: So even Spiritus's warriors have dark manikins?

Original: Y'shtola:Well, this is a first.
Dialogue: Well, this is a first.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):I was born from Ace's wishes.
Dialogue: I was born from Ace's wishes.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):I am not a warrior to protect this world. I am a giver of respite!
Dialogue: I am not a warrior to protect this world. I am a giver of respite!

Original: Machina:I can't imagine Ace getting close to something that looks like me.
Dialogue: I can't imagine Ace getting close to something that looks like me.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):I atoned for what you could not.
Dialogue: I atoned for what you could not.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):For Ace, this place meant peace.
Dialogue: For Ace, this place meant peace.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):With nowhere to return, he had to make a new home.
Dialogue: With nowhere to return, he had to make a new home.

Original: Tidus:But he did that because he was tricked by the Cloud of Darkness!
Dialogue: But he did that because he was tricked by the Cloud of Darkness!

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):He was hurt by the values of those from other worlds.
Dialogue: He was hurt by the values of those from other worlds.

Original: Zidane:Even knowing that what's important is different for everyone...it must've been tough for him.
Dialogue: Even knowing that what's important is different for everyone...it must've been tough for him.

Original: Bartz:We should have listened more.
Dialogue: We should have listened more.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):This won't be resolved by talking. You were raised in different worlds.
Dialogue: This won't be resolved by talking. You were raised in different worlds.

Original: Machina:Is that what Ace thinks I'm like?
Dialogue: Is that what Ace thinks I'm like?

Original: Y'shtola:He relied on you.
Dialogue: He relied on you.

Original: Machina:But it's wrong.
Dialogue: But it's wrong.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):What is?
Dialogue: What is?

Original: Machina:I'm not that strong. I'm absolutely pathetic...
Dialogue: I'm not that strong. I'm absolutely pathetic...

Original: Machina:I need to atone on my own. Otherwise, there's no point.
Dialogue: I need to atone on my own. Otherwise, there's no point.

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):It's too late. Ace is beyond your reach now.
Dialogue: It's too late. Ace is beyond your reach now.

Original: Machina:Then I'll chase after him, no matter where he goes!
Dialogue: Then I'll chase after him, no matter where he goes!

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):He wants to be left alone. Stop trying to get in his way!
Dialogue: He wants to be left alone. Stop trying to get in his way!

Original: Tidus:I'm with you, Machina. I need to apologize, too.
Dialogue: I'm with you, Machina. I need to apologize, too.

Original: Zidane:Yeah. I want Ace to stay our friend. I want him to believe in us!
Dialogue: Yeah. I want Ace to stay our friend. I want him to believe in us!

Original: Y'shtola:Then it's decided.
Dialogue: Then it's decided.

Original: Machina:Thank you...!
Dialogue: Thank you...!

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):I'm all Ace has left. I won't let you hurt him...!
Dialogue: I'm all Ace has left. I won't let you hurt him...!

Original: Seven:He even made a dark manikin to protect this place...
Dialogue: He even made a dark manikin to protect this place...

Original: Eight:He probably took elements from people other than Machina to make his ideal friend.
Dialogue: He probably took elements from people other than Machina to make his ideal friend.

Original: Cinque:Like playing dress up with a doll!
Dialogue: Like playing dress up with a doll!

Original: Deuce:That means Ace is serious. We have to find him quickly!
Dialogue: That means Ace is serious. We have to find him quickly!

Original: Dark Manikin (Machina):Guah... Dammit... Isn't there anything I can do...!?
Dialogue: Guah... Dammit... Isn't there anything I can do...!?

Original: Onion Knight:Agh!
Dialogue: Agh!

Original: Machina:No! Grr...
Dialogue: No! Grr...

Original: Machina:Where are you, Ace!?
Dialogue: Where are you, Ace!?

Original: Machina:Ace! Aaace!
Dialogue: Ace! Aaace!

Original: Ace:I'm here.
Dialogue: I'm here.

Original: Ace:You've got some nerve coming here.
Dialogue: You've got some nerve coming here.

Original: Ace:Surviving as a coward...
Dialogue: Surviving as a coward...

Original: Machina:You can call me whatever you want. I won't make excuses.
Dialogue: You can call me whatever you want. I won't make excuses.

Original: Ace:Did you enjoy your life, forgetting the cadets you hated so much?
Dialogue: Did you enjoy your life, forgetting the cadets you hated so much?

Original: Machina:Forget!? I never forgot.
Dialogue: Forget!? I never forgot.

Original: Machina:The doctor told me to remember you, her children.
Dialogue: The doctor told me to remember you, her children.

Original: Ace:Mother? Mother was there?
Dialogue: Mother? Mother was there?

Original: Ace:No... I can't believe it. She wouldn't abandon us and save you.
Dialogue: No... I can't believe it. She wouldn't abandon us and save you.

Original: Machina:I don't understand why, either. But I remember. Please believe me.
Dialogue: I don't understand why, either. But I remember. Please believe me.

Original: Machina:After the war ended, I saw the vermilion flag. You were all beneath it.
Dialogue: After the war ended, I saw the vermilion flag. You were all beneath it.

Original: Machina:You were in the middle, Ace. Cater and Deuce were beside you... I would never forget something like that.
Dialogue: You were in the middle, Ace. Cater and Deuce were beside you... I would never forget something like that.

Original: Ace:...So what? You think I'm going to be convinced just like that?
Dialogue: ...So what? You think I'm going to be convinced just like that?

Original: Machina:I have so many things I want to talk to you about. To apologize for, and to tell you...
Dialogue: I have so many things I want to talk to you about. To apologize for, and to tell you...

Original: Machina:I won't leave you here alone!
Dialogue: I won't leave you here alone!

Original: Ace:Like a child throwing a tantrum...
Dialogue: Like a child throwing a tantrum...

Original: Vaan:You're both kids.
Dialogue: You're both kids.

Original: Onion Knight:I understand that you want some peace and quiet. But this is not the way to go about it.
Dialogue: I understand that you want some peace and quiet. But this is not the way to go about it.

Original: Squall:You don't have to force yourself to get along with us. But you can't hurt others.
Dialogue: You don't have to force yourself to get along with us. But you can't hurt others.

Original: Tidus:We might not understand your world even now, but...
Dialogue: We might not understand your world even now, but...

Original: Tidus:You're our friends. We wanted to understand, which is why we argued.
Dialogue: You're our friends. We wanted to understand, which is why we argued.

Original: Onion Knight:You decided this on your own, Ace. So whether you come back to us or not is fine, but...
Dialogue: You decided this on your own, Ace. So whether you come back to us or not is fine, but...

Original: Onion Knight:If you continue to rely on the power of darkness, you'll be in danger. And I won't abandon a friend like that.
Dialogue: If you continue to rely on the power of darkness, you'll be in danger. And I won't abandon a friend like that.

Original: Vaan:We can talk about this. Say the things you want to say.
Dialogue: We can talk about this. Say the things you want to say.

Original: Ace:I don't want your pity. Sadness won't change the past.
Dialogue: I don't want your pity. Sadness won't change the past.

Original: Ace:Just leave me alone!
Dialogue: Just leave me alone!

Original: Ciaran:It looks like the peace you found has vanished.
Dialogue: It looks like the peace you found has vanished.

Original: Ciaran:This place is submerged in darkness... It can't give you the respite you wanted, right?
Dialogue: This place is submerged in darkness... It can't give you the respite you wanted, right?

Original: Ace:...There's no going back for me.
Dialogue: ...There's no going back for me.

Original: Onion Knight:You give up too easily! Where there's a will, there's a way.
Dialogue: You give up too easily! Where there's a will, there's a way.

Original: Ace:This is the path I will follow...and I'll fight you if I must!
Dialogue: This is the path I will follow...and I'll fight you if I must!

Original: Ace:Gck... You're all...in my way...!
Dialogue: Gck... You're all...in my way...!

Original: Ace:She said she resonated with Mother. She must be...close...
Dialogue: She said she resonated with Mother. She must be...close...

Original: Machina:Gch... Ace...
Dialogue: Gch... Ace...

Original: Ace:Still standing, I see...
Dialogue: Still standing, I see...

Original: Machina:Listen to me!
Dialogue: Listen to me!

Original: Machina:Just what are you trying to do!?
Dialogue: Just what are you trying to do!?

Original: Machina:Are you going to wait for Dr. Arecia here? In this monster-infested building!?
Dialogue: Are you going to wait for Dr. Arecia here? In this monster-infested building!?

Original: Ace:Maybe. I can't exist anywhere else...
Dialogue: Maybe. I can't exist anywhere else...

Original: Machina:That's not true. Give us a chance...
Dialogue: That's not true. Give us a chance...

Original: Machina:I hate it... I'm tired of leaving people behind... Going forward without them...
Dialogue: I hate it... I'm tired of leaving people behind... Going forward without them...

Original: Ace:Those weak thoughts are what made you choose to be a l'Cie!
Dialogue: Those weak thoughts are what made you choose to be a l'Cie!

Original: Machina:I couldn't forgive myself for being weak. I wanted to stand side-by-side with you guys...
Dialogue: I couldn't forgive myself for being weak. I wanted to stand side-by-side with you guys...

Original: Ace:I can't imagine a bleeding heart like you would survive that battle.
Dialogue: I can't imagine a bleeding heart like you would survive that battle.

Original: Machina:But I might have become a little better at fighting.
Dialogue: But I might have become a little better at fighting.

Original: Machina:I can't use magic as well as Rem, but...we completed the same missions.
Dialogue: I can't use magic as well as Rem, but...we completed the same missions.

Original: Ace:Hmph. Didn't you skip out on an important mission?
Dialogue: Hmph. Didn't you skip out on an important mission?

Original: Machina:I know it's unforgiveable!
Dialogue: I know it's unforgiveable!

Original: Machina:But at that time, most of my own will was gone...
Dialogue: But at that time, most of my own will was gone...

Original: Ace:That's trivial for a l'Cie.
Dialogue: That's trivial for a l'Cie.

Original: Machina:I know, but...I wanted to protect.
Dialogue: I know, but...I wanted to protect.

Original: Ace:You only wanted to protect Rem.
Dialogue: You only wanted to protect Rem.

Original: Machina:I know that! But I lost her...and understood.
Dialogue: I know that! But I lost her...and understood.

Original: Machina:I wanted the power to protect you guys until the end.
Dialogue: I wanted the power to protect you guys until the end.

Original: Ace:...What a pretty excuse.
Dialogue: ...What a pretty excuse.

Original: Rem:Should we do something? They've been arguing the whole time...
Dialogue: Should we do something? They've been arguing the whole time...

Original: Deuce:It's nice to have someone you can argue with, though.
Dialogue: It's nice to have someone you can argue with, though.

Original: Jack:But you're so quiet, Rem, we never had a thing to fight with you about.
Dialogue: But you're so quiet, Rem, we never had a thing to fight with you about.

Original: King:For being so sensitive, Ace is awful at showing his emotions.
Dialogue: For being so sensitive, Ace is awful at showing his emotions.

Original: Eight:You don't need emotions to complete a mission, so this was just fine back home.
Dialogue: You don't need emotions to complete a mission, so this was just fine back home.

Original: Eight:But this world is different... We need to find an answer that works.
Dialogue: But this world is different... We need to find an answer that works.

Original: Rem:Machina isn't really the type of person to argue, either.
Dialogue: Machina isn't really the type of person to argue, either.

Original: Seven:...We know.
Dialogue: ...We know.

Original: Seven:Some of us sensed that he was suffering from a sense of helplessness...
Dialogue: Some of us sensed that he was suffering from a sense of helplessness...

Original: Eight:But in order to continue fighting, we had to throw away that feeling. Still...
Dialogue: But in order to continue fighting, we had to throw away that feeling. Still...

Original: Eight:What's moving Ace right now isn't a sound argument...
Dialogue: What's moving Ace right now isn't a sound argument...

Original: Seven:But words spoken with all his might.
Dialogue: But words spoken with all his might.

Original: Rem:Can we just leave them like this? What if they start fighting again?
Dialogue: Can we just leave them like this? What if they start fighting again?

Original: King:They'll get tired of it eventually. Then we'll come back to get them.
Dialogue: They'll get tired of it eventually. Then we'll come back to get them.

Original: Seven:Machina's emotions are much more powerful than our arguments right now.
Dialogue: Machina's emotions are much more powerful than our arguments right now.

Original: Eight:Let's give them a little more time. I'm sure Ace will find an answer soon.
Dialogue: Let's give them a little more time. I'm sure Ace will find an answer soon.

Original: Machina:(I felt it was the first time we said what we really felt. It was overdue, but...)
Dialogue: (I felt it was the first time we said what we really felt. It was overdue, but...)

Original: Machina:(I hoped my feelings would reach him.)
Dialogue: (I hoped my feelings would reach him.)

Original: Machina:Please, Ace... There's still time in this world.
Dialogue: Please, Ace... There's still time in this world.

Original: Ace:What a nice excuse to ignore reality.
Dialogue: What a nice excuse to ignore reality.

Original: Machina:Reality is different here.
Dialogue: Reality is different here.

Original: Machina:You're alive and talking to me here and now, Ace.
Dialogue: You're alive and talking to me here and now, Ace.

Original: Ace:I'm...alive. Here, and now...
Dialogue: I'm...alive. Here, and now...

Original: Machina:Chichiri!?
Dialogue: Chichiri!?

Original: Ace:You know her name?
Dialogue: You know her name?

Original: Machina:Huh? Well...the name just appeared in my head...
Dialogue: Huh? Well...the name just appeared in my head...

Original: Bartz:She's been waiting for you, Ace, thinking you'd run away together.
Dialogue: She's been waiting for you, Ace, thinking you'd run away together.

Original: Seven:You didn't run...because you were waiting for us, right?
Dialogue: You didn't run...because you were waiting for us, right?

Original: King:Talk about "high-maintenance."
Dialogue: Talk about "high-maintenance."

Original: Ace:Are you all...okay with this? Even if we protect this world, we...
Dialogue: Are you all...okay with this? Even if we protect this world, we...

Original: Deuce:We decided to think about it later. The answer's not going to come right away.
Dialogue: We decided to think about it later. The answer's not going to come right away.

Original: Deuce:If this world is destroyed, we won't have that time.
Dialogue: If this world is destroyed, we won't have that time.

Original: Eight:You won't have time for those arguments you haven't had yet.
Dialogue: You won't have time for those arguments you haven't had yet.

Original: Ace:Do I look like someone who argues all the time?
Dialogue: Do I look like someone who argues all the time?

Original: Bartz:Are they wrong?
Dialogue: Are they wrong?

Original: Machina:Am I like that too...?
Dialogue: Am I like that too...?

Original: Ace:...Don't ask me.
Dialogue: ...Don't ask me.

Original: Bartz:Chichiri, huh. I like it. If you don't have anywhere to go, why not stay on our airship?
Dialogue: Chichiri, huh. I like it. If you don't have anywhere to go, why not stay on our airship?

Original: Bartz:Ace seems pretty attached to you. And we can't leave you here with all these monsters.
Dialogue: Ace seems pretty attached to you. And we can't leave you here with all these monsters.

Original: Seven:Right. It might be nice having a chocobo. Ace would make a perfect caretaker.
Dialogue: Right. It might be nice having a chocobo. Ace would make a perfect caretaker.

Original: Chocobo:Kweh! Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweh!

Original: Ace:At least ask first.
Dialogue: At least ask first.

Original: Ace:...Leave me alone already.
Dialogue: ...Leave me alone already.

Original: King:How persuasive. How about it, Machina?
Dialogue: How persuasive. How about it, Machina?

Original: Machina:Come on, let's go.
Dialogue: Come on, let's go.

Original: Machina:(This is only momentary... I can't reverse the fate they chose.)
Dialogue: (This is only momentary... I can't reverse the fate they chose.)

Original: Machina:(But I can talk to them right now.)
Dialogue: (But I can talk to them right now.)

Original: Machina:(In this world...I want to be friends with Class Zero.)
Dialogue: (In this world...I want to be friends with Class Zero.)

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Your craving for power has ceased. Darkness casts a shadow over the transient light...
Dialogue: Your craving for power has ceased. Darkness casts a shadow over the transient light...

Original: Machina:The Cloud of Darkness? You're the cause of all this, aren't you?
Dialogue: The Cloud of Darkness? You're the cause of all this, aren't you?

Original: Cloud of Darkness:But the darkness is deepening. The balance is crumbling.
Dialogue: But the darkness is deepening. The balance is crumbling.

Original: Cloud of Darkness:You are the only light left in this world. We will enjoy crushing you...
Dialogue: You are the only light left in this world. We will enjoy crushing you...

Original: Ace:You haven't fulfilled your mission yet, have you?
Dialogue: You haven't fulfilled your mission yet, have you?

Original: Machina:What do you want?
Dialogue: What do you want?

Original: Onion Knight:It's not something you can reason with. Get ready, everyone!
Dialogue: It's not something you can reason with. Get ready, everyone!

Original: Onion Knight:We won't let you destroy this world!
Dialogue: We won't let you destroy this world!

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Now then... How bright is the light of your will?
Dialogue: Now then... How bright is the light of your will?

Original: Ace:You used me, saying Mother's name...
Dialogue: You used me, saying Mother's name...

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Your will summoned a deep darkness. But it is not enough for a flood.
Dialogue: Your will summoned a deep darkness. But it is not enough for a flood.

Original: Ace:...Saying that I found my way would be a lie. But I won't rely on you any longer!
Dialogue: ...Saying that I found my way would be a lie. But I won't rely on you any longer!

Original: Cloud of Darkness:So you have returned to the light. Then we will test your strength!
Dialogue: So you have returned to the light. Then we will test your strength!

Original: Cloud of Darkness:It is not yet our time. When the time comes, we will appear.
Dialogue: It is not yet our time. When the time comes, we will appear.

Original: Cloud of Darkness:Even if that be at your side...
Dialogue: Even if that be at your side...

Original: Mog:Kupooo! The barrier is gone, so I'm here now, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupooo! The barrier is gone, so I'm here now, kupo!

Original: Mog:Are those dimensional coordinates!? From the Cloud of Darkness, kupo!?
Dialogue: Are those dimensional coordinates!? From the Cloud of Darkness, kupo!?

Original: Onion Knight:I don't know what it's thinking, so I can only guess...
Dialogue: I don't know what it's thinking, so I can only guess...

Original: Onion Knight:But if we continue, we're bound to find the crystal core of darkness.
Dialogue: But if we continue, we're bound to find the crystal core of darkness.

Original: Basch:And beside it, we might find the one using its power.
Dialogue: And beside it, we might find the one using its power.

Original: Onion Knight:Maybe it plans to show up when that person destroys the balance of the world.
Dialogue: Maybe it plans to show up when that person destroys the balance of the world.

Original: Machina:And you're okay with this? Isn't she your enemy?
Dialogue: And you're okay with this? Isn't she your enemy?

Original: Onion Knight:Like I said before, it's like a natural disaster.
Dialogue: Like I said before, it's like a natural disaster.

Original: Onion Knight:It's scary, but powerful. I think it's better we use that to our advantage.
Dialogue: It's scary, but powerful. I think it's better we use that to our advantage.

Original: Ace:She hinted knowing something about Mother, too...
Dialogue: She hinted knowing something about Mother, too...

Original: Noct:Which reminds me... Someone else mentioned someone we haven't met.
Dialogue: Which reminds me... Someone else mentioned someone we haven't met.

Original: Noct:Which means they heard stories about our world's crystal and king from someone. Huh?
Dialogue: Which means they heard stories about our world's crystal and king from someone. Huh?

Original: Basch:You mean Vayne... Perhaps Spiritus's warriors exchange information among themselves.
Dialogue: You mean Vayne... Perhaps Spiritus's warriors exchange information among themselves.

Original: Mog:There's a chance Spiritus's warriors are trying to make friends just like we are, kupo.
Dialogue: There's a chance Spiritus's warriors are trying to make friends just like we are, kupo.

Original: Mog:This world is very unstable. Not even the gods can help, kupo.
Dialogue: This world is very unstable. Not even the gods can help, kupo.

Original: Machina:If the crystal core of darkness continues this way, what will happen to this world?
Dialogue: If the crystal core of darkness continues this way, what will happen to this world?

Original: Onion Knight:It'll be returned to nothingness. Or at least, that's what the Cloud of Darkness wants.
Dialogue: It'll be returned to nothingness. Or at least, that's what the Cloud of Darkness wants.

Original: Basch:Or a world ruled by the one controlling the crystal core.
Dialogue: Or a world ruled by the one controlling the crystal core.

Original: Noct:Both sound pretty terrible to me.
Dialogue: Both sound pretty terrible to me.

Original: Mog:So we need to find and get the crystal core of darkness under control, kupo!
Dialogue: So we need to find and get the crystal core of darkness under control, kupo!

Original: Machina:How do you feel about that, Ace?
Dialogue: How do you feel about that, Ace?

Original: Ace:Do you really think I'm going to stop here?
Dialogue: Do you really think I'm going to stop here?

Original: Ace:I can't just do nothing.
Dialogue: I can't just do nothing.

Original: Ace:I'll go with you. I need time to think.
Dialogue: I'll go with you. I need time to think.

Original: Noct:You don't need to be friends with all of us, you know.
Dialogue: You don't need to be friends with all of us, you know.

Original: Basch:If you want to spend your time in peace, do so.
Dialogue: If you want to spend your time in peace, do so.

Original: Ace:Don't treat me like I'm fragile.
Dialogue: Don't treat me like I'm fragile.

Original: Machina:Ahhh... You're not listening.
Dialogue: Ahhh... You're not listening.

Original: Machina:You really were fragile. Normally, you're so composed, so everyone was worried about you.
Dialogue: You really were fragile. Normally, you're so composed, so everyone was worried about you.

Original: Machina:They were trying to figure out how they should treat you, how much space they should take.
Dialogue: They were trying to figure out how they should treat you, how much space they should take.

Original: Ace:But I plan to say what I mean from now on.
Dialogue: But I plan to say what I mean from now on.

Original: Machina:I hope so. If there's anything I can do, let me know.
Dialogue: I hope so. If there's anything I can do, let me know.

Original: Onion Knight:If we can save this world, I'm sure there will be time for you guys to think.
Dialogue: If we can save this world, I'm sure there will be time for you guys to think.

Original: Onion Knight:After all, this world was meant to be a place of respite.
Dialogue: After all, this world was meant to be a place of respite.

Original: Ace:I knew fear. I also knew what it was like to face death without it.
Dialogue: I knew fear. I also knew what it was like to face death without it.

Original: Ace:But this place is different from Orience. Even if it's only temporary, I can choose my own future.
Dialogue: But this place is different from Orience. Even if it's only temporary, I can choose my own future.

Original: Noct:Hey, it doesn't all have to be so serious. You can have your own chocobo here.
Dialogue: Hey, it doesn't all have to be so serious. You can have your own chocobo here.

Original: Noct:Even Prompto was excited to see it.
Dialogue: Even Prompto was excited to see it.

Original: Machina:Can we really keep Chichiri on the airship?
Dialogue: Can we really keep Chichiri on the airship?

Original: Basch:I don't foresee any problems.
Dialogue: I don't foresee any problems.

Original: Ace:Then Machina will help me take care of her.
Dialogue: Then Machina will help me take care of her.

Original: Machina:Really!? That's fine with me, but why...?
Dialogue: Really!? That's fine with me, but why...?

Original: Ace:You named her. So take some responsibility.
Dialogue: You named her. So take some responsibility.

Original: Machina:Alright. I don't mind. I like chocobos, too.
Dialogue: Alright. I don't mind. I like chocobos, too.

Original: Onion Knight:I'm glad you two can be friends again. Now then...
Dialogue: I'm glad you two can be friends again. Now then...

Original: Mog:Let's fly, kupo!
Dialogue: Let's fly, kupo!

Original: Seven:We never really had a future because of how it all ended...
Dialogue: We never really had a future because of how it all ended...

Original: Cinque:But we're still alive in this world, aren't we?
Dialogue: But we're still alive in this world, aren't we?

Original: Cater:And we said we would go on a trip!
Dialogue: And we said we would go on a trip!

Original: Edgar:Well, I would love to show you lovely ladies around our country...
Dialogue: Well, I would love to show you lovely ladies around our country...

Original: Sabin:You're the king, Big Brother. You could feed them all the best food!
Dialogue: You're the king, Big Brother. You could feed them all the best food!

Original: Seven:That would destroy the balance of this world, and then where would we be.
Dialogue: That would destroy the balance of this world, and then where would we be.

Original: Cater:Maybe we'll see someplace similar. That would be fun!
Dialogue: Maybe we'll see someplace similar. That would be fun!

Original: Setzer:We can take you anywhere your heart desires with the airship.
Dialogue: We can take you anywhere your heart desires with the airship.

Original: Cinque:That's right! Why don't we travel the world?
Dialogue: That's right! Why don't we travel the world?

Original: Edgar:I will do everything in my power to see your wishes fulfilled.
Dialogue: I will do everything in my power to see your wishes fulfilled.

Original: Sabin:Right. Say whatever it is you like!
Dialogue: Right. Say whatever it is you like!

Original: Seven:We appreciate the kindness. There might come a time when we lose our way in the future, but...
Dialogue: We appreciate the kindness. There might come a time when we lose our way in the future, but...

Original: Edgar:It's like Sazh said. In those times, rely on the grown-ups.
Dialogue: It's like Sazh said. In those times, rely on the grown-ups.

Original: Edgar:We will do what we can to help.
Dialogue: We will do what we can to help.

Original: King:Things we couldn't do back home... Now that I think about it, I feel like I was interested in music.
Dialogue: Things we couldn't do back home... Now that I think about it, I feel like I was interested in music.

Original: Rem:You, King!? This is news!
Dialogue: You, King!? This is news!

Original: King:I can't remember well, but I have a feeling I wanted to perform.
Dialogue: I can't remember well, but I have a feeling I wanted to perform.

Original: Jack:Yeaaah, that sounds like fun! Why don't we form a band?
Dialogue: Yeaaah, that sounds like fun! Why don't we form a band?

Original: Jack:I think Trey would join us, too!
Dialogue: I think Trey would join us, too!

Original: King:But none of us have ever played an instrument before.
Dialogue: But none of us have ever played an instrument before.

Original: Eiko:I could teach you! There are all kinds of instruments on the airship!
Dialogue: I could teach you! There are all kinds of instruments on the airship!

Original: Machina:It seems like our airship is equipped with a lot more than we expected.
Dialogue: It seems like our airship is equipped with a lot more than we expected.

Original: Eiko:Flutes, guitars, fiddles, drums... You can choose whatever you want!
Dialogue: Flutes, guitars, fiddles, drums... You can choose whatever you want!

Original: King:Then let's give it a try.
Dialogue: Then let's give it a try.

Original: Jack:Maybe I'll even take this practice seriously!
Dialogue: Maybe I'll even take this practice seriously!

Original: Machina:Well, at least you're serious about something...
Dialogue: Well, at least you're serious about something...

Original: Rem:Everyone's mood changed so quickly now that we have time.
Dialogue: Everyone's mood changed so quickly now that we have time.

Original: Rem:Is there something you want to do, Machina?
Dialogue: Is there something you want to do, Machina?

Original: Machina:I don't know. I've only been thinking about apologizing to Class Zero this whole time...
Dialogue: I don't know. I've only been thinking about apologizing to Class Zero this whole time...

Original: Rem:Hehe... Then I guess you and I have some thinking to do about how to spend our time here.
Dialogue: Hehe... Then I guess you and I have some thinking to do about how to spend our time here.

Original: Machina:Well...I'd like to spend as much time with Class Zero as possible.
Dialogue: Well...I'd like to spend as much time with Class Zero as possible.

Original: Rem:Oh! Don't you have to take care of that chocobo?
Dialogue: Oh! Don't you have to take care of that chocobo?

Original: Machina:Right. If I'm late, I'll get an earful from Ace.
Dialogue: Right. If I'm late, I'll get an earful from Ace.

Original: Ciaran:That gentle light's come back to your eyes.
Dialogue: That gentle light's come back to your eyes.

Original: Ace:I've just delayed the problem. Once this fight is over, we'll have to face it again.
Dialogue: I've just delayed the problem. Once this fight is over, we'll have to face it again.

Original: Ace:...I know. I won't do it again.
Dialogue: ...I know. I won't do it again.

Original: Ace:I don't want to be taken by that darkness ever again...
Dialogue: I don't want to be taken by that darkness ever again...

Original: Machina:How are you doing, Chichiri?
Dialogue: How are you doing, Chichiri?

Original: Ace:...What a weird name.
Dialogue: ...What a weird name.

Original: Machina:It's not that weird! I don't even know why I named her that, though.
Dialogue: It's not that weird! I don't even know why I named her that, though.

Original: Ciaran:I think it's a fine name. She seems to like it.
Dialogue: I think it's a fine name. She seems to like it.

Original: Chocobo:Kweh, kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh, kweh!

Original: Ciaran:Are you fine with being here?
Dialogue: Are you fine with being here?

Original: Ace:I am. Because it's what my friends chose.
Dialogue: I am. Because it's what my friends chose.

Original: Ace:And Machina is here. Someone I can take my frustrations out on.
Dialogue: And Machina is here. Someone I can take my frustrations out on.

Original: Machina:That's fine with me.
Dialogue: That's fine with me.

Original: Ace:But...we just finished arguing. So I'm out of steam right now.
Dialogue: But...we just finished arguing. So I'm out of steam right now.

Original: Machina:You've got to be kidding me!
Dialogue: You've got to be kidding me!

Original: Ciaran:It means you're friends. Take good care of each other.
Dialogue: It means you're friends. Take good care of each other.

Original: Ciaran:In the future, you'll be happy you did.
Dialogue: In the future, you'll be happy you did.
